column4: I have an existing windows network usin tcp/ip protocol. Will ubuntu connect automatically or is there a way to install the porotocol?
I have installed ubuntu on my laptop. My home network uses the tcp/ip protocol. Do I need to configure ubuntu to use this protocol?

Ok my comp can connect to browse but it doesnt recognize the networked computers running windows. Also when i follow a link to download something, it gives me the popup to save to disk but doesnt do anything
no I am using the tcp/ip
does network neighborhood ring a bell?
